data.text: a state of elementary or undifferentiated consciousness.
data.attributionText: from the GNU version of the Collaborative International Dictionary of English.

data.text: The state or level of <xref>consciousness</xref> where sense data can be confirmed by an <xref>observer</xref>.

data.text: The state or quality of being <xref>aware</xref> of something
